DOC.HEAD: Fixed Mortgage Rates Down to 9.69 Percent
DOC.TEXT: Fixed-rate home mortgages are averaging 9.69 percent, according to a national survey released Friday by the Federal Home Loan Mortgage Corp. That was down from a rate of 9.75 percent last week. On 1-year adjustable-rate mortgages, lenders were asking an average initial rate of 8.34 percent this week, down from 8.39 percent the week before.
